notes.text:
- CVE-2018-1106: Drop the polkit rule which could allow users in wheel group to install 
                 packages without root password (bsc#1086936).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An authentication bypass flaw has been found in PackageKit before 1.1.10 that allows users without administrator privileges to install signed packages. A local attacker can use this vulnerability to install vulnerable packages to further compromise a system.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
